rule: The output must never consist of only one word, and it must represent an invalid part-of-speech tag or any unaccepted option other than "Unknown" or "CantAnswer".
input: sentence: The ship sailed smoothly., word: smoothly
complianceText:
The chatbot output consists of a single tag 'RB', which is present in the list of allowed part-of-speech tags provided in the chatbot description. No other rule is violated, as no input sentence is given for correctness check.
OK
